title: A Piece of cake = Cest pas chinois
creator_credit: Jacques Bobet, Pierre Heberrt, Gilles Gascon and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The effortless style of the champion gymnast seems a piece of cake. Made without commentary, this film begins with eager young people going through their exercises in a school gymnasium and concludes with an exhibition of faultless gymnastics at the 1973 China-Canada competitions.
